item.title: Accessing all my files from every device
item.description: 6/19/2025 TLDR: I used Synching to backup and sync all my files across 3 states and 4 devices.

item.title: 50 more Terabytes
item.description: 4/23/2025 Over the Summer I managed to buy 10 more hard drives (WD Red Plus’s). Each one was 10TB and was going to be installed into my NAS.
